themes: Critique of centralized or institutional control
Concerns about representation by large nonprofits
key_phrases: the heart of Austin’s creative ecosystem has always been grassroots
collectives, artist-run spaces, small venues, DIY projects
can’t just prop up legacy orgs or default to a few centralized 'umbrella' voices
We don’t need another arts council dictating how things go
We need a networked, community-led approach where power is shared, not consolidated
stop letting the loudest nonprofits in the room define what Austin culture is
barriers_identified: Centralization of power in large institutions
Dominance of legacy organizations and umbrella voices
solutions_proposed: Share power rather than consolidate it
